explains: v. 结婚，娶，嫁；（使）结合；坚持，专心于（活动、信仰或制度）

sentences.en: The couple plan to wed next summer.
sentences.cn: 这俩人计划在夏天结婚。

sentences.en: In his red ear, she whispered, "Why I wed you?"
sentences.cn: 她在他通红的耳朵轻语：“我为何要嫁给你？”

sentences.en: He has bought a house for the couple and hopes that one day they can wed.
sentences.cn: 他为这对情侣买了房子，希望有一天他们能够结婚。
